title: Question about flex and solo/duo queues
body: Let's say that I am Silver on solo/duo and Gold on Flex 5v5 at the moment. At the end of the season will I get Silver or Gold border?

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct. You'll receive unique ranked rewards for the ranked modes that you participate in. The border in loading screen will change, depending on what mode you're queueing for.

So for your example, you'd see a Silver border next season when you played Solo/Duo Ranked matches and the Gold border when you queue up for Ranked Flex 5v5.

Check out our [**Ranked FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) for more information on how the system works. If you have any other questions, let me know.
But what about the profile border?

Your profile border should display the highest ranked rating that you're currently are placed in. This means that your profile should show a Gold Border, if we were using the examples from your OP.

I hope this helps!
Thanks! Same for normal games, am I right?

I heard about a special reward if you reach gold in both. What kind of reward will it be? A special victorious skin? Or... maybe.. you can choose an older victorious skin. Like maybe the victorious skin for my beloved elise?
You should get both borders and which one you see in the loading screen will depend on which queue you are playing.
